name: faster-video
title: Faster Video
description: Allows manipulation of the playback rate of HTML5 media
author: ispedals

preferences.name: speeds
preferences.title: Playback Speeds
preferences.description: Sets which playback speeds to choose from (comma-separated)

preferences.name: modifiers
preferences.title: Playback Speed Modifiers
preferences.description: Sets by which units one can change the playback speed (comma-separated)
